ValidationRule.description: If the case is Resolved or Closed the Root Category can not be Under Review
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Resolved') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed'), RecordType.Name = 'PGi-Client External Support', ISPICKVAL(Tracking_Root_Category__c , 'Root Category Under Review') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not use Root Category Under Review when the Status is Resolved or Closed.
